entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:29 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: NNW 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
